biotools.summary: FVE-novel is a computational pipeline for reconstructing complete or near-complete viral draft genomes from metagenomic data. FVE-novel deploys FastViromeExplorer to efficiently map metagenomic reads to viral reference genomes or contigs, performs de novo assembly of the mapped reads to generate scaffolds, and extends the scaffolds via iterative assembly to produce final viral scaffolds.
